descriptions: ['DescriptionTreo Homes are delighted to offer this 3 bedroom plus maids townhouse, in the brand new Safi Community in Town Square. These units are just about to be handed over and this Type 10, 3 bedroom offers a BUA of 2,134 Sq,Ft and a sits on a plot of around 2,200 SQ FT. Each home has been practically designed and carefully considered to achieve a modern urban lifestyle within beautifully landscaped suburban neighbourhood. All the townhouses are within walking distance to the pool and park so its perfect for the occupier, looking to make it their family home. A selection of cafes, restaurants and shops, cinema soon to be released are all within close proximity to this community, which has its very own community park. Being very reasonably priced, these modern townhouses should not be overlooked.3 bedroom + Maid RoomBrand NewModern Design1 Yr service warrantyPool and parkFootball pitchExclusiveMultiple UnitsCall Treo Homes to view today']

descriptions: ["DescriptionTreo Homes is excited to present the newest community in Dubai Hills Estate.Maple is a stunning community consisting of 4 different types of townhouses, with crystal clear pools with a lifeguard, lush green parks for children's activities or walking dogs, BBQ area etc.The property itself sits on a generous plot which is within walking distance to the main pool and park within Maple and also an even shorter walk to the smaller park.
